summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 PONTIAC SOLSTICE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SERVICE AIR BAGS WARNING ALARM ILLUMINATED CONTINUOUSLY. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V061000 (AIR BAGS) HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO COGGIN BUICK GMC OF ORANGE PARK AT 7245 BLANDING BLVD JACKSONVILLE FL 32244, WHERE THEY CONFIRMED THE PARTS WERE NOT YET AVAILABLE AND DISCONNECTED THE ALARM. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 78,000. THE VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PART NOT YET AVAILABLE.
